version.name: Kotlin! YAML! Brand new day...
version.changelog: - Migrated whole code to Kotlin. - Switched to YAML from XML files - it's nicer :)

version.name: Templates. Templates everywhere!
version.changelog: - New intuitive splash screen. - Paradox Generator can load multiple input files now (main file + libraries). - Changed xml generator file format to accommodate new features. - Rewritten xml parsing code and made it more stable. - Added templates, functions and localization support. - Fixed crash on startup if specified main file doesn't exist. - Optimised a lot of code.

version.name: Gradle Fix!
version.changelog: - Fixed project structure. - Reformatted code and included Caellian Core as it's slowly dying out. - Switched to MIT license. - Moved away from JetBrains form designer and written pure Swing GUI code.

version.name: Project segmentation
version.changelog: - Added support for version management. - Simplified some code using new convenience classes from Caellian Core.

version.name: New and shiny!
version.changelog: - Added icons - Added splash screen due to (in some cases) prolonged loading time - Added .gitignore to help with project management - Added about window accessible by clicking on program logo inside of the program. - Made source changeable from withing program (accessed by clicking 'Generator:' inside of the main window.) - requires a restart in order for resources to load.
